section.22: The Book on Virtues of Jihad

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: "The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: meaning: Allah Mighty and Sublime is He says: 'The Mujahid in My cause, he has guarantee fro Me. If I I seize him, I cause him to inherit Paradise, and if I return him, I return him with a reward or spoils of war.'" [He said:] This Hadith is Gharib Sahih from this route
